page.title: 15Work in the Area
page.content: The Charlton Industrial Estate consists of corrugated iron and wooden buildings erected fifty years ago and are connected by unmade roads. Approximately thirty local men and one woman are employed by the seven firms on the Estate ,three of which are sawmills. Two mills make fencing huts etc and the third is the only manufacturer od dowels in the south of England. There are two car repair firms . There is little heating in the Units apart from electric or calor gas fires in the office sections,but one sawmill has a wood waste boiler. There is a seond hand Agricultural Machinery Dealer. In East dean there is a panel beating repair shop.
